moves.2. d4 e4: A rare center. B4 is important, needs to be protected man
moves.3. e3 Bxb4+: Gives awat control, no no, no, b4 its really important!
moves.4. c3 Bd6 5. c4 Qh4 6. g3 Qh6: Lost a tempo by white, its true but not a bad position for queen i think
moves.7. Nc3 Nf6: Centre not solve, white going for c5 its not bad
moves.9... g6 10. Rb1 c6 11. Bg2 d5: Black formed a stair wich contains white, i think this is the true winning of the game
moves.12. Bb2 Ng4 13. h3: Now this knight its going to be a trouble
moves.13... Nxe3 14. Qe2 Nc4 15. h4 Qg7 16. Rd: A new picture, white its a masive defender of the king, not a single piece attacks
moves.24. Qxc5 Nxb1 25. Qd6 Bg4 26. Ng5 Bc3+: Its an open space mate, really good looking
moves.27. Kd1 Qd4+ 28. Kc2 Qd2+: Savage attack, this got a hurt
